text: <@U2MLMERFD|mrbuggy> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/mrbuggy/F2VTYM2DA/-.txt|Untitled> and commented: hello all, I am trying to build the HFC sdk docs as instructed here <http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/nodeSDK/app-developer-env-setup/> ... I am trying to build the docs from the *starter kit* but it is showing me  the following output. where can I find this index.d.ts? Thank you all! Currently, I'm looking at  <http://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/sdk/node/lib/hfc.js|github.com/hyperledger/fabric/sdk/node/lib/hfc.js> for documentation

initial_comment.comment: hello all, I am trying to build the HFC sdk docs as instructed here <http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/nodeSDK/app-developer-env-setup/> ... I am trying to build the docs from the *starter kit* but it is showing me  the following output. where can I find this index.d.ts? Thank you all! text:
*NodeSdkSample* app  uses “*grpcs*” prefix referring memberservice and peer (_"ca_url":"*grpcs*://tlsca:7054"_).
It this mandatory for *TLS enabled* clients – using “*grpcs*” prefix must be present referring memberservice and/or peer ?
no - it was just a convention used in the NodeSDK
